panels.content: Linx Commerce
Volume de Pedidos -Últimos 3 Dias
Volume de Pedidos - Hoje

targets.rawSql:
select sub.Value as Quantidade, (
convert([datetime2],
    CONCAT(
    datepart(year, getdate()), '-',
    right('0' + rtrim(cast(datepart(month, getdate()) as char(2))),2), '-',
    right('0' + rtrim(cast(sub.dia as char(2))),2), ' ',
    right('0' + rtrim(cast(sub.hour as char(2))),2)
    ,':00:00.000')
    )) as time
from (
SELECT count(*) AS Value, DATEPART(DAY, PaymentDate) as dia, DATEPART(HOUR, PaymentDate) as hour
FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders_Grafana]
WHERE  $__timeFilter(PaymentDate) and PaymentDate < convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112) +' 23:59:00'
GROUP by DATEPART(DAY, PaymentDate), DATEPART(HOUR, PaymentDate)
) AS sub 
ORDER BY time

select sub.Value as Total, (
convert([datetime2],
    CONCAT(
    datepart(year, getdate()), '-',
    right('0' + rtrim(cast(datepart(month, getdate()) as char(2))),2), '-',
    right('0' + rtrim(cast(sub.dia as char(2))),2), ' ',
    right('0' + rtrim(cast(sub.hour as char(2))),2)
    ,':00:00.000')
    )) as time
from (
SELECT sum(OrderTotal) AS Value, DATEPART(DAY, PaymentDate) as dia, DATEPART(HOUR, PaymentDate) as hour
FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders_Grafana]
WHERE  $__timeFilter(PaymentDate) and PaymentDate < convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112) +' 23:59:00'
GROUP by DATEPART(DAY, PaymentDate), DATEPART(HOUR, PaymentDate)
) AS sub 
ORDER BY time

SELECT isnull(sum(OrderTotal),0)
  FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders]
  WHERE PaymentDate = convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112)

SELECT count(PaymentDate)
  FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders]
  WHERE PaymentDate = convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(PaymentDate)
  FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders_Grafana]
  WHERE PaymentDate > DATEADD(minute, -60, GETDATE()) and PlatformType = 'ECOMMERCE'

SELECT count(PaymentDate)
  FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders]
  WHERE PaymentDate = convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112) and PlatformType = 'ECOMMERCE'

select sub.Value as ECOMMERCE, (
convert([datetime2],(CONCAT(convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),120),' ',
case len(sub.time)
when 1 then '0' + CAST(sub.time as varchar(1))
when 2 then CAST(sub.time as varchar(2))
end
,':00:00.000'))
)) as time
from (
SELECT count(*) AS Value, DATEPART(hour, PaymentDate) as time
FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders_Grafana]
WHERE PlatformType = 'ECOMMERCE' and PaymentDate >= convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112) +' 00:00:00.000'
GROUP by DATEPART(hour, PaymentDate)
) AS sub

select sub.Value as MARKETPLACE, (
convert([datetime2],(CONCAT(convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),120),' ',
case len(sub.time)
when 1 then '0' + CAST(sub.time as varchar(1))
when 2 then CAST(sub.time as varchar(2))
end
,':00:00.000'))
)) as time
from (
SELECT count(*) AS Value, DATEPART(hour, PaymentDate) as time
FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders_Grafana]
WHERE PlatformType = 'MARKETPLACE' and PaymentDate >= convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112) +' 00:00:00.000'
GROUP by DATEPART(hour, PaymentDate)
) AS sub

SELECT
  $__timeEpoch(<time_column>),
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM
  <table name>
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY
  <time_column> ASC

  WHERE PaymentDate >= DATEADD(minute, -60, GETDATE()) and PaymentMethod NOT IN ('boleto', 'CreditCard', 'credito', 'DebitCard', 'debito', 'parcelamento', 'Financing', 'Deposit', 'deposito')

SELECT count(PaymentDate)
  FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders]
  WHERE PaymentDate = convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112) and PaymentMethod NOT IN ('boleto', 'CreditCard', 'credito', 'DebitCard', 'debito', 'parcelamento', 'Financing', 'Deposit', 'deposito')

SELECT isnull(sum(OrderTotal),0)
  FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders_Grafana]
  WHERE PaymentDate > DATEADD(minute, -60, GETDATE()) and PaymentMethod NOT IN ('boleto', 'CreditCard', 'credito', 'DebitCard', 'debito', 'parcelamento', 'Financing', 'Deposit', 'deposito')

SELECT isnull(sum(OrderTotal),0)
  FROM [dcgmanager_dw].[dbo].[vOrders]
  WHERE PaymentDate = convert(varchar(10),GETDATE(),112) and PaymentMethod NOT IN ('boleto', 'CreditCard', 'credito', 'DebitCard', 'debito', 'parcelamento', 'Financing', 'Deposit', 'deposito')
